title: Monetary Policy Expectations and Surprises
content: Figure 3:  March 2017 Primary Dealer Survey and Market Participant Survey  Market Participants:Primary Dealers: Level of the Target Fed  Funds Rate/Range  25th Percentile 1.38%  Median 1.63%  75th Percentile 1.88%  Level of the Target Fed  Funds Rate/Range  25th Percentile 1.38%  Median 1.63%  75th Percentile 1.63%  Source: Federal Reserve Bank of New York, Survey of Primary Dealers (https://www.newyorkfed.org/markets/primarydealer_survey_questions.html) and Survey of Market Participants (https://www.newyorkfed.org/markets/survey_market_participants.html).  Note:  Survey responses received by March 6, 2017.  FOMC is Federal Open Market Committee. March FOMC meeting took place on March 14–15, 2017.  Point estimate for the most likely outcome of the level of the target federal funds rate or  range when the FOMC first announces a change to its reinvestment policy:
